content:
Hey all - not sure if anyone here has been following the Lab Services spec in the Order Catalog IG, but if not, perhaps we should be:
https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-order-catalog/labservices.html

I have not done a review, but my 5 minute read makes me feel like this is something we can (eventually) reference to help us in the definition of the order / assay space. Tagging @Larry Babb and @Mullai Murugan to perhaps compare to what was done for eMERGE ?
Yep that or the similar one for LOINC code definitions. The method is a good place for assay specific information. Thanks Kevin!
I agree that this is an important part of the IG and should be reviewed. As you say, it also may help with this particular issue
